import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Game Token Packs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/monetization/token-packs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all token packs for a game. Successful request will return a [Game Token Pack Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-token-pack-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Game Token Pack Successful","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Game Token Pack Object","description":"Contains game token pack data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"The internal mod.io ID of the game token pack.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"token_pack_id":{"description":"The ID of the token pack.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"price":{"description":"The price of the token pack in USD.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1000},"amount":{"description":"The amount of tokens the pack contains.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1000},"portal":{"description":"The portal of the token pack.","type":"string","example":"WEB"},"sku":{"description":"The SKU ID of the token pack.","type":"string","example":"SKU0001"},"name":{"description":"The name of the game token pack.","type":"string","example":"Token Pack A"},"description":{"description":"The description of the game token pack.","type":"string","example":"This pack contains 1000 tokens!"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the token pack was added to the game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103},"date_updated":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the game token pack was updated.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
